title: Establishing Workload Identity for Zero Trust CI/CD: From Secrets to SPIFFE-Based Authentication
summary: CI/CD systems have become privileged automation agents in modern infrastructure, but their identity is still based on secrets or temporary credentials passed between systems. In enterprise environments, these platforms are centralized and shared across teams, often with broad cloud permissions and limited isolation.
